claim: at 459 feet , the schiesinger building be the fourth largest building in johannesburg

   1. Identify the buildings in Johannesburg from the table. (All rows except rows 5, 6, and 8)
   2. Sort the buildings by their height in feet from the table (Row 1, Kwadukuza Egoli Hotel Tower 1 & Trust Bank Building, feet: 459; Row 3, Standard Bank Building, feet: 455; Row 1, Carlton Centre, feet: 732)
   3. Count the number of buildings taller than the Schlesinger Building (Only the Standard Bank Building and the Carlton Centre are taller, both have a height greater than 459 feet)
   4. Determine the position of the Schlesinger Building in this sorted list (The Schlesinger Building is the third building in the sorted list)
   5. Compare the position with the expected position for the fourth largest building in Johannesburg (If the position matches the expected position, then the claim is true; otherwise, it is false)

Final Answer:
